- The Kingdom affirms with all its 'strength and determination' that those who protect its lands are the sons of its people. ๐ธ๐ฆ
Secondly, Trump always criticizes Saudi Arabia, Russia, China, Japan, and the European NATO alliance, saying to NATO, "Pay, and we'll protect you." These statements are nothing but laughable to his gullible public because such election slogans, combined with the names of these great nations, resonate strongly with the American public. In contrast, smaller nations or those that claim to be influential and resistant to America are not even worth mentioning to him. Trump only boasts to his audience about the larger, significant nations.
Letโs not forget that later, Trump appeared in a defeatist manner, praising Saudi Arabia and admitting that he could not stop arms deals because, in his words, "Theyโll turn to China and abandon us." He confessed his inability to halt any weapons deal between the two countries. However, we ignored him, as we are neither rabble nor fanatics who get swept up by praise and fall apart under criticism, like you and others. His words, or those of any other leader, do not concern us. Many have tried to emulate his political extortion but failed, from Biden to Macron, Erdoฤan, and many more who are accustomed to making statements without following them with actions. Later, King Khalid International Airport in Riyadh became crowded with their presidential planes amidst the smiles of His Highness.
